QuestData.Title: Unbound
QuestData.Description: Can you see them, $p? Farmers from the orchard, tied up and under inspection. Being hauled off in chains.$B$BThe mogu value strength above all else. Anyone deemed fit for work will be sent to toil under their cruel whips.$B$BAs for the others, well...$B$BLet's not waste any more time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Set 10 Captured Nectarbreeze Farmers free in Camp Gormal.
QuestData.CompletionText: Those ropes should give with a strong tug.
QuestData.RewardText: The pandaren were subjected to mogu rule in ancient times - we'll never let it happen again.
